text: The 1975 All-Pacific-8 Conference football team consists of American football players chosen by various organizations for All-Pacific-8 Conference teams for the 1975 NCAA Division I football season. ==Offensive selections== ===Quarterbacks=== * John Sciarra, UCLA ===Running backs=== * Ricky Bell, USC * Chuck Muncie, California ===Wide receivers=== * Steve Rivera, California * Tony Hill, Stanford ===Tight ends=== * Ted Pappas, Stanford ===Tackles=== * Ted Albrecht, California * Marvin Powell, USC ===Guards=== * Randy Cross, UCLA * Alex Karakozoff, Stanford * Phil McKinnely, UCLA ===Centers=== * Ray Pinney, Washington ==Defensive selections== ===Linemen=== * Cliff Frazier, UCLA * Gary Jeter, USC * Duncan McColl, Stanford ===Linebackers=== * Kevin Bruce, USC * Geb Church, Stanford * Bob Horn, Oregon State * Dan Lloyd, Washington ===Defensive backs=== * Al Burleson, Washington * Mario Clark, Oregon * Danny Reece, USC * Chuck Wills, Oregon ==Special teams== ===Placekicker=== * Mike Langford, Stanford ===Punter=== * Gavin Hedrick, Washington State ==Key== ==See also== *1975 College Football All-America Team ==References== All- Pacific-8 Conference Football Team Category:All-Pac-12 Conference football teams
title: 1975 All-Pacific-8 Conference football team
